killing floor tiene todo lo que cualquier juego de zombies necesita, ACCION, yo soy partidario de que la historia es importante siempre, prefiero mil veces resident evil antes que left4dead(aunque tambien sea un buen juego) pero este juego no necesita una, es facil, matas o te matan y el trabajo en equipo nunca fue tan importante, siendo necesario pasar municion y dinero si tus compañeros lo necesitan, con una variada cantidad de personajes y armas(mayoria DLCs) pero añadiendo mas usando steam workshop.
lo que mas me gusta de este juego es su Bullet Time que no importa si lo iniciaste vos o un compañero, es util y ademas queda epico!!
si tenes dinero, una compu decente, ganas de matar zombies en camara lenta, es tu juego

This game is an instant classic:
-Great to play with friends.
-A simple leveling system.
-A balanced class system.
-class specific weapons.
-great custom servers.

Overall a solid 9/10

I'm a man of simple pleasures. I like bullets, gunpowder, gasoline. I like shooting things. I like shooting multiple, scary things that appear to have crawled out of Satan's fire imbued, decrepit vagina. And in this way, Killing Floor delivers. Running through tight, dimly lit corridors as haunting calls drift around your ears, you know they are coming for you. And eventually, they will find you. So you, armed only with a knife and a weak pistol, must face the vicious, hideous hordes. But you need not face them alone. Bringing friends is the only way to enjoy this game. So if you have friends, congratulations! You'll enjoy this game. If you enjoy immolating hallways of disgusting ghouls, you'll enjoy this game. If you like difficult levels, blood smeared hallways, haunting sounds, dim and flickering lights, and jump scares, you'll enjoy this game. And if you're like me, and enjoy sending entire packs of Satan's vagina crawlers back to the fiery, fleshy pits from whence they came with a single blast from a flamethrower as you laugh manically, watching your sanity slip away from the sheer violence and gore..... Then you will enjoy this game.

the only bad thing is that it doesnt have a awesome story mode it has objective mode but that as close we come to it if they make it like it has story and a porpus ohter then survivar it would be at least top 2 on my list

By far the best co op zombie game next to Left 4 dead. The structure of the two games are quite different, with Killing Floor being more arena like and with waves. However the amount of mods available for this game is amazing, ranging from imported or newly created skins and weapons from other games to new enemy types like the Brute, new classes, and sometimes full mods such as one that recreates Aliens and Dead Space. You truly get more than what it's worth.
me encanto este juego, pero el problema es lo de los DLC, de por si el juego hay que comprarlo sabes...  pero en si el juego es muy bueno graficamente, el gameplay, etc.
perdy cuul.

PROS=holy fcking cow......killing monster/zombie/zed have never been so fun!with perk/character class!lvling! finding the most suitable place to stand your ground on vast selection of maps!manage your $$$ and create a build for every character class/perk!
CONS=the server creation method is damn bloody awful,its like creating a server from the time i play online with a 56k modem,fowarding port,modifying .ini files....i almost give up after trying to create a server on the first day i bought this game,after a hour or two and 10 cigarette later.finally got the server up and running.and yes.....1 last thing in the 'cons' section,if u got no friend[s] to play this with you,it will lower your gaming  experience,what i mean is....err...less fun,at least for me,so......go get some real life friends,start voice chat/group voice chat and start shooting!currently i got 4 guys including myself playing together,and it was the best way to experience this game,yes you can go online and join a random server,but in my 15++ hour of gameplay,ive encounter troll and really high lvl player that should not belong in a normal diff game making harder for the appropriate lvl player to lvl up.
and at the time i writing this review ,the game is selling for 5USD....WTH u guys waiting for? reading more reviews?! press that add to cart button!

Now let's get one thing straight here, Killing Floor is a great game as you will learn from playing, but the player community here are douchebags. Here is my actual review and opinion.

Killing Floor is a Zombie Horror Arcady-like FPS with RPG elements (Character class based leveling). The single player aspect of Killing Floor is not amazing, but is fun enough to keep you ocupied for a while at least. By yourself you pose a reasonable challenge to the zombies on the easy and normal difficulties, but on Hard and Nightmare you will find trouble, especially in the earlier waves. The game has two modes : Survival, where you are pitted against the Infected and fight through the waves to eventually fight the Patriarch (Boss Infected) and escape, and Missions, which have a set number of objective based gameplay which can be challenging (or frustrating) from time to time. I'd say that Survival is the real meat and bones of Killing Floor as the mission based gameplay can get tedious and boring from time to time, not to say the survival gameplay can't get boring....it just takes a hell of a lot longer. As I mentioned earlier in this review, You can take on the horde by yourself, BUT you can take on the horde with others online (or LAN). Here is where the community can ruin the game. People can leave mid-game (If you are one of these people who leave without a just reason then fuck you) shortening the list of survivors and your chances of winning the wave, Playing on a random server (reguardless of difficulty) People will more than likely votekick you for a low level of your selected class (Rember sir you were new at the game at one point too so if you have a high level and you votekick people with low levels then get over your superiority complex you fucking idiot). The community for this game is one of the reasons that the online is ruined in my opinion, as the servers with genuinely nice people (Or at least ones who'll play the game and try to have fun) is too damn low. If you're playing online I reccomend playing with friends on a closed (Private) server, You'll all probably have a better connection to the server, no random people can join and ruin the fun of an all melee group (Really funny cause one person always ends up with no new melee wepon xD), and if they don't want to play with you cause of a low level you can just unfriend the douchebag on steam (You don't need that kind of negativity in your life). So overall I recommend this game (Just not for public online...just....just don't), It's fun and it'll give you hours of mindless fun. 7/10

awesome game

I have few hours in this game, but I know people who've easily sunk thousands. This game is a great mix of strategic fun and stressful combat situations. To properly enjoy this game however, I would reccomend you gather some friends, as sometimes when you play with randoms, they might not agree with you, or there might be a lack of communication, so like everyother co-op game, bring friends. It won't be difficult though, because you can easly hook your friends into this game. It also goes on sale often, right now you can get 6 copies for $24.98. I'd wait for it on sale, but hell, it's worth the $20 they charge for it upfront.

[h1]Посвещается моей любимой игре.[/h1]

Познакомился я с [b]Killing Floor[/b] осенью 2011 года, тогда она провела на меня очень сильное впечатление. Зайдя в первый раз на какой-то сервер я не мог понять что происходит и в кого нужно стрелять. Мне выдали обычный пистолет и нож, я пошел в атаку. Убили меня почти сразу, отстрелив головы 5-и зомби, 6-ой меня схватил, я не смог вырваться и меня убили. С каждой волной мне было все интереснее в нее играть, покупать новое оружие, наблюдать новые типы зомби. Вот и по сей день я играю в эту замечательную игру.

В начале июля 2014 года выпустили летнее обновление «End of the Line», похоже оно будет последним в истории [b]Killing Floor[/b]. Далее следует вторая часть игры. Я не забуду первую часть игры и буду продолжать в нее играть.

Моя оценка: 10/10

Ótimo jogo, apesar de meio antigo, apresenta uma ótima jogabilidade e os mods feitos pela comunidade deixa o jogo mais divertido ainda. Gostei muito da possibilidade de evolução das classes do jogo, pena que só vai até o nível 6, apesar de demorar bastante pra chegar neste nível. Depois que você ja evoluiu todos os personagens é interessante adicionar mods(aumenta os níveis, adiciona novas armas, monstros, mapas). Se resolver colocar mods antes de evoluir todos as classes, tem que cuidar com as modificaçoes que NÃO são whitelist(não permitem a evolução das classes). No fórum fórum da Tripwire você pode ver quais mods são whitelist.

Killing Floor was released in 2009. It is an FPS/horror/co-op survival game. The game takes place in the remenants of England after an outbreak of failed experiments from a top secret lab. I have wanted to buy this game for ages, I love it's gameplay, characters, weapons, storyline and the fact it takes place in Great Britain for a change. I feel Tripwire Interactive have done a brilliant job on this game and the DLC for it just adds to the shear epicness and depth, the added characters all have their own personalities and unique looks, my personal favourite is the bombsuit expert, looks kind of like a juggernaut from MW2/MW3. I like the fact that there are no crosshares for the guns, this adds to the realism and makes the game that bit more challenging... we all like a good challenge... don't we?

LEGGI TUTTO SE SEI INTERESSATO A COMPRARE
Questo gioco...Questo gioco   che dire?  COMPRATELO
 
il miglior modo per analizarlo è fare la divisione di pro e contro

pro
Partiamo dalle basi, grafica e meccaniche
Ok inizio subito col dire che la grafica per quanto il gioco non sia recentissimo fa il suo lavoro  e lo fa bene quindi non è quello un problema
La meccanica non è nulla di nuovo,il gioco non presenta trama o fili di storia ma la nuova modalita a "obbiettivi" apre una specie di storia in cui uno scienziato (un incrocio tra leonardo di capiro e brad pit) molto ricco, riesce a trovarer un modo per potenziarsi geneticamente e inizia a fare incorci con esseri umani e a clonare questi mostri orribili che cercheranno di creare una nuova era di forme viventi superiori       si dai è banale ma fa il suo sporco dovere
Le armi
Le armi in un gioco di questo genere sono fondamentali, sono molte e si dividono in diverse classi,o meglio, perk
berserk:il classico tank che carica un'ascia o una spada
medico: oltre che ad essere un classe molto versatile detiene il compito più importante del gioco  CURARE. tuti possono curarsi da soli ma come cura un buon medico non cura nessuno.
Commando: il classico fucilone d'asalto che prende un ak o un m16 (ci sono molte armi ricordate) 
tiratore: si concentra su armi a lungo raggio e fa della precisione il suo lavoro
demolitore: Demoman di questo gioco lancia granate e lancia razzi sono i suoi strumenti
Piromane: IL FUOCO  per chi sua questa fiammeggiante classe consiglio di usare come avatar il pyro di team fortres e comprare un lancia fiamme
supporto: utilizza principalmente fucili a pompa o armi che facciano molto male dalla corta distanza.Fondamentale
Ogni classe (a seconda dell loro livello ) posseggono sconti sulle loro armi. E credetemi. in un gioco dove uccidere serve a comprarsi le armi uno sconto fa la differenza
I mostri
Sono tanti e fanno paura, sono brutti e sembra che neanche l'inferno le voglia nelle sue terre
saranno molte le volte in cui ci volteremo e urleremo fidatevi
Lo slow motion
 se effettueremo degli headshot consevutivi il gioco ci farà un regalo stupendo,Sparare a dei mostri orribili e fagli saltare la testa con una 44 magnum a rallenty non ha prezzo
La difficolta
Il gioco non è facile anzi sarà molto impegnativo e il boss finale sarà un sfida molto ardua
La musica
le musiche metal e rock faranno decollare il gioco piu di quanto non lo faccia da solo

Surviving with your friends or team mates in a enclosed or open area against waves of specimens. It might sound easy, but you will soon find out that isn't the case when you play this game for the first time. Even on the 'normal' difficulty, this game can be a challenge to a lot of players. The higher you crank up the difficulty, the more advanced tactics you will come across. I can truly say that this is the first game i have come across that meets the expected experience of it's game difficulties.
With diffirent perks to choose from, you can play the game with diffirent goals. Weither it will be to keep your team alive, to pop every specimen head you can find, or to just burm em all straight to hell. 

I was suprized by the amount of fun you can have in this game. I wasn't expecting it by the looks of it. It might not be your next-door triple A-game. But you really get more for what you've payed for.
